ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: To the Program for Technological Development in Tools for Health-PDTIS-FIOCRUZ for the use of microscopy facility (RPT07C), and Bruna Hilzendeger Marcon and Ana Paula Ribeiro for technical support. The authors also thank Wagner Nagib de Souza for the support on figure preparation.

Financial support: Ministério da Saúde e Fundação Araucária (PPSUS/2013), Fundação Araucária/SESA-PR/CNPq/MS-Decit PPSUS/2015 - (019/2017). JTM (305357/2014-0), CNDS (309432/2015-4) and JB (303306/2017-3) are CNPq fellows. AHDC, DK, CNDSand JB contributed equally to this work.
